alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Fremont; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:32PM MDT until June 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FREMONT...SOUTH CENTRAL EL PASO AND NORTHWESTERN PUEBLO COUNTIES... At 131 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pueblo West, or 11 miles northwest of Pueblo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported 2 inch hail near Penrose. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo West, Pueblo Reservoir, Pinon and Penrose. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
